TunableTuple.name: arriving_situation_state
TunableTuple.description: The situation state used for when a Sim is arriving as a Massage Therapist.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableVariant.name: arrival_timeout
TunableVariant.description: Optional tunable for how long to wait before progressing to the Do Stuff state. This is basically here for if you don't care if they do the arriving behavior all of the time.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The length of time before moving onto the Do Stuff state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: change_clothes_leave_situation_state
TunableTuple.description: The state that is used to get the Sim to change clothes before ending the situation and ending up in the leave lot situation.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableVariant.name: departing_timeout
TunableVariant.description: Optional tunable for how long to wait before progressing past the change clothes state. This is basically here so that if the Sim takes a long time to change clothes they will just give up and leave the lot.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The length of time before moving onto the Do Stuff state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: do_stuff_situation_state
TunableTuple.description: The main state of the situation. This is where Sims will do everything except for arrive and leave.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

Tunable.name: change_outfit_before_leave
Tunable.description: If True then the Sim will advance to the Change Clothes state. If False then the Sim will just end the situation at the end of the Do Stuff state.

TunableVariant.name: do_stuff_timeout
TunableVariant.description:
Optional tunable for when to end the Do Stuff state.
If this is enabled then the Do Stuff state will eventually time out and either end the situation or have the Sim go into the Change Clothes state.
If this is disabled the situation will just stay in the Do Stuff state forever.

Tunable.name: max_time
Tunable.description: The maximum time a visitor will spend on the relaxation venue as a guest.

Tunable.name: min_time
Tunable.description: The length of time to wait before advancing to the Change Clothes state.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

Tunable.name: situation_default_job
Tunable.description: The default job that a visitor will be in during the situation.
